Welcome to Toneanalyzer’s documentation!¶

Hello¶

class ChatMessagesADT.ChatMessagesADT(messages=None)¶

Generates ChatMessages object based on list filled with Message objects.

add_message(message)¶

Adds Message object.

delete_message(idx)¶

Deletes a message from ChatMessagesADT.

delete_old(save_period)¶

Deletes messages, which period has expired.

delete_sentences(emotion)¶

Deletes sentences with specific tone in messages and returns deleted sentences

fill_emotions()¶

Fills self.emotions.

get_percentage(emotion)¶

Returns the percentage of the specific emotion in relation to all the messages, downloaded from the chat.

get_sentences(emotion)¶

Returns sentences with specific tone.

is_empty()¶

Checks if self.messages is empty

class ChatMessagesADT.MessageADT(text='', created=None)¶

Generates Message object based on array filled with Sentence objects.

delete_sentences(emotion)¶

Removes sentences with a given tone

fill_sentences(text)¶

Generates Array filled with Sentence objects

filter_sentences(emotion)¶

Returns sentences string with specified emotion or None if no sentences is found

is_empty()¶

Checks, if message is not empty

class ChatMessagesADT.SentenceADT(text='', emotion=None)¶

Generates Sentence object. Receives a sentence as a text attribute.

text_tone.detect_tone(ukr_text)¶

Detects text’s tone by using IBM tine analyzer.

text_tone.json_to_tone(json_object)¶

Receives json and returns the tone of the sentence.

text_tone.translate_to_en(text)¶

Thanslates the data to English for tone analyzis.
